org.osate.ge.graphics

Class PolyBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osate.ge.graphics.PolyBuilder

  • public class PolyBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for creating polygon or polyline graphics. Builds polygon by default.
    See Also:
    Graphic
    No Extend:

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Graphic build()
      Creates a poly graphic based on the current state of the builder.
      static PolyBuilder create()
      Creates a poly builder.
      PolyBuilder dashed()
      Configures the poly builder to use dashed lines.
      PolyBuilder dotted()
      Configures the poly builder to use dotted lines.
      PolyBuilder lineWidth(int value)
      Sets the line width to use to create the poly
      PolyBuilder points(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double... points)
      Configures the poly builder to build a poly composed of the specified points.
      PolyBuilder polygon()
      Configures the poly builder to build a polygon
      PolyBuilder polyline()
      Configures the poly builder to build a polyline

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static PolyBuilder create()
        Creates a poly builder.
        Returns:
        a poly builder

      • points

        public PolyBuilder points(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double... points)
        Configures the poly builder to build a poly composed of the specified points.
        Parameters:
        points - the points to use when creating the poly. All coordinates must be in the range of [0.0, 1.0]. Polylines are scaled by the editor.
        Returns:
        this builder to allow method chaining.

      • lineWidth

        public PolyBuilder lineWidth(int value)
        Sets the line width to use to create the poly
        Parameters:
        value - the new value for the line width.
        Returns:
        this builder to allow method chaining.

      • dashed

        public PolyBuilder dashed()
        Configures the poly builder to use dashed lines.
        Returns:
        this builder to allow method chaining.

      • dotted

        public PolyBuilder dotted()
        Configures the poly builder to use dotted lines.
        Returns:
        this builder to allow method chaining.

      • polygon

        public PolyBuilder polygon()
        Configures the poly builder to build a polygon
        Returns:
        this builder to allow method chaining.

      • polyline

        public PolyBuilder polyline()
        Configures the poly builder to build a polyline
        Returns:
        this builder to allow method chaining.

      • build

        public Graphic build()
        Creates a poly graphic based on the current state of the builder.
        Returns:
        the newly created graphic
